project3.text: In this project, for being the first with webdev, i have tried to solve an diary problem that i could find. So, i realized that i could help my family in a better bills management using technology. Thereby, i developed a website that allow to store the many month bills (example: light, water) and, using graphs - Chart.js -, analyze unnecessary expenses. As a result of this project, i learned resposiviness, align, interaction with databases - and how to store them safe -, etc.

HoraDoServico.text: 'project 1' was my first experience with mobile development (React Native) and i've used old projects concepts - creating accounts with mongoDB, respossiviness, animations, etc -. This solution was developed to auxiliate my familiy in organization of dailys home activites. So, i tried to develop a system of communication more efficient with the family members, declaring each users activites seeking for the simplest user experience for my parents. In this scenario, i believe that the most important learn that i had was about better perfomances in diferrents devices and understanding more about the complexity of a good user experience.

CLUST.text: This project was created during the Apple Developer Academy's Foundations course. With the Academy as the context, we developed an app that promotes teams aligned with each student's learning expectations. Throughout the development process, I gained experience in Swift, SwiftUI, Multipeer Connectivity, prototyping, and encountered various other challenges that emerged during the project. Using peers, the entire team formation process occurs entirely via a local network, posing a challenge in the development process.

ESTAPLIT.text: Estaplit is a parking marketplace that connects drivers to real-time available parking spaces. I was responsible for developing the backend using Django with Django Rest API, expanding my knowledge in web development. I also worked on the frontend in React Native. Additionally, I integrated the backend with Google Maps and handled the development and integration of the frontend in React Native. This experience solidified my skills in creating APIs, integrating with external services, and building flexible and scalable systems.
